Name: angioma serpiginosum
Definition: A skin hemangioma that is characterized by the presence of small red dots that cluster together to form a linear or snake-like array or ring-shaped pattern located_in the blood vessels of the skin.

Name: verrucous keratotic hemangioma
Definition: A globe disease that is characterized by inflammation of the inside of the eye.

Name: obsolete bathing trunk nevus
Definition: A globe disease that is characterized by inflammation of the inside of the eye.

Name: angiokeratoma
Definition: A Goodpasture syndrome that is characterized by damage to only kidney capillaries.
